---
title: "maestro"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

n1_name <- "FAM"
n2_name <- "Quasar 670"
rp_name <- "Cal Orange 560"

n1_color = "blue"
n2_color = "red"
rp_color = "green"

plate_name <- "PCR-211006-1030-SB4_384"

getQAResults <- function(plate_name, target_name) {
  
  data_obj <- read_csv(
           paste(
             "./",
             plate_name,
             "/",
             paste(
               plate_name,
               " -  Quantification Amplification Results_",
               target_name,
               ".csv",
               sep = ""
             ),
             sep = ""
           )
         )
  
  return(data_obj)
  
}

n1 <- getQAResults(plate_name, n1_name)
n2 <- getQAResults(plate_name, n2_name)
rp <- getQAResults(plate_name, rp_name)

rp %>% 
  ggplot() +
    #RP
    geom_point(
      aes(
        x = Cycle,
        y = O23
      ),
      color = rp_color
    ) +
    #N1
    geom_point(
      data = n1,
      aes(
        x = Cycle,
        y = O23
      ),
      color = n1_color
    ) +
    #N2
    geom_point(
      data = n2,
      aes(
        x = Cycle,
        y = O23
      ),
      color = n2_color
    ) + 
    labs(
      x = "cycle",
      y = "",
      title = "O23"
    )
  
```
